overview:
Gail is co-founder, Vice Chair & CFO of TheNowMall.com (“NOW”), a patented technology-enabled, Internet-based, Locally-Focused Communications & Advertising Network using proprietary mobile technology.

NOW links stores, restaurants and services with neighborhood consumers for local search and shopping. Optional rapid order fulfillment is usually within 30 to 45 minutes via independent participating Taxi Fleet owners and their drivers 24 / 7/ 365.

Manufacturers, Stores, Restaurants & Services can promote specials In-Store, Online, At-The-Door and on affiliated Taxi Fleet vehicles.

Before founding NOW, Gail co-founded Willow CSN Inc. (now Arise.com), pioneer of virtual off-premise staffing for major call centers with patented business method and technologies.

Gail has 25 years experience in financial sales (Merrill Lynch + her own financial planning practice) & management plus experience in franchising sales & operations, banking & finance.
